title: Prime NOVA
details:
“Prime NOVA” the new addition to the Sri Lanka’s housing market located in one of the prestigious and rapid developing suburbs in Colombo. Thalawathugoda one of the most claimed cities for living combine the comfort and convenience into your lifestyle by gathering all the facilities such as leading supermarkets, fashion outlets, hospitals, banks, schools and many more into the vicinity.

Four luxurious modern villas at “Prime NOVA” are exclusively designed to offer a family a relaxed and sophisticated lifestyle. 3050 Square Feet, two story houses, each built on 8.5 perch land, provide you the modern and unique luxuries
